awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Group Theory and Combinatorics
awd_abstract_narration: This research is directed at several problems in                           combinatorics and group theory. The principal investigator will                 consider the fundamentals of the sphere packing problem,                        applications of low dimensional lattices, and the Monster simple                group. The sphere packing work has already led to a patent on                   quantizing a certain type of code but the long term merit is in                 leading to connections between the Monster simple group and the                 Monster.                                                                             The project is concerned with problems in combinatorics and                group theory. In particular, the principal investigator will                    concentrate on a particularly remarkable group which is called                  the Monster. The outcome of this investigation is likely to                     impact other areas of mathematics and physics.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
